article_title: Why Health Insurance Is Now A Far Bigger Nightmare Than It Ever Was

article_metadata.description: Does it seem even remotely reasonable that a married couple earning $63,000 a year could spend $33,000 in premiums and out-of-pocket expenses? Welcome to health insurance in 2015.
article_metadata.author: Victor Lipman
